attributes.action: set a fixed term for goverments between elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems to me that within quite a large scale, the serving government can pick the date of the election to suit it's popularity ratings.  I think this is undemocratic and should cease.  I propose that the government's term be fixed to 4 years exactly.  EG 1st July every 4 years.  This way all the paries play under the same rules with no advantages.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
